channel.title: new info on Realms
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "new info on Realms" - curiosity solved

item.title: Re: new info on Realms
item.content:encoded: The discount is 75% 50%. The only differences i know of other then the discount is that only season 2+ player can be in them. There is Immortal Realm specific content on the way though.

item.title: Re: new info on Realms
item.content:encoded:
found that immortal realm's upgrades cost less (thanks kirakun). heres a bit of text i coppied out of Hinamizawa Village:

Collection Squad

* 25,000 Ryo
* 3 Brilliant Crystals
* Village Size: 1

Fortified Walls

* 12,000 Ryo
* 3 Brilliant Crystals
* Village Size: 7

item.title: Realms
item.content:encoded: anyone know if the immortal realms been granted any bonuses yet?
